name: Magnetic Drift
description:
Small game developed for the 2019 lisp game jam (https://itch.io/jam/lisp-game-jam-2019).

Drive a little car around a few tracks and see how fast you can go!

Just unzip or untar the file for your respective operating system, and run the executable!

Source code available at:
https://github.com/IGJoshua/magnetic-drift
